14.post_text: The Red Peri Chilli, also known as the Peri-Peri pepper is Africa’s hottest pepper. These small chillies measure up to 175,000 Scoville heat units, which are even hotter than our renowned Chilli Padi which comes in at 50,000-100,000 Scoville heat units– that’s hot!
